Strasbourg, France  - good size, not too big but big enough. International. Best of two countries . Great schools. Everything can be done by bike. Lots of green parks and mountains around

Turin (if you work remotely). Very low cost of living, amazing culture, food and wine. Very close to the mountains. Right in the center of Europe, ~2hr max flight to ANY European city. Decent airport. 1hr train to Milan. 4hr train to Paris. 2hr drive to Switzerland.
